metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9411 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2015-9100.Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2015-9100. Notes: All CVEusers should reference CVE-2015-9100 instead of this candidate. Allreferences and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to preventaccidental usage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9411` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lame - 3.99.5+repack1-9ubuntu0.1~esm1
libmp3lame0 - 3.99.5+repack1-9ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: lame package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.99.5+repack1-9ubuntu0.1~esm1').
